def calculate_minimum_road_cost(populations):
    populations.sort()
    min_cost = 1
    smallest_population = populations[0]
    for population in populations[1:]:
        min_cost += smallest_population * population
    return min_cost

    for population in populations[1:]:
        min_cost += smallest_population * population
